channel.title: ChromeCast on DIYDeveloper.io
channel.description: Recent content in ChromeCast on DIYDeveloper.io

item.title: Add Ethernet to your ChromeCast for 12 bucks
item.description: ChromeCast’s are great… as long as your wifi is. I upgraded my router firmware, and my ChromeCast started dropping out. Rather than fixing that problem, I figured “why not just hardwire the damn thing?”.
